input_text:
Job Title: Manufacturing Engineering Technician I - Third Shift - Bryan Dairy

Location: Seminole, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
This position pays a $2500 sign-on bonus (non-Jabil and non-former Jabil, external candidates only) 

This is a Third Shift role - 11pm to 7am, Mon-Fri

Job Summary

Provide equipment and process support (including machine maintenance) to printed circuit assembly lines.

Must have manufacturing knowledge or experience with SMT processes for PCBA box builds, wave soldering, selective soldering and experience with PMs and troubleshooting of soldering equipment.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES include the following. Other duties may be assigned.

 Maintain and develop machine programs, part definition (PD) files and machine set-ups.  Optimize machine programs and set-ups to meet or exceed theoretical product run-rate.  Observe machine and line performance and determine the necessary steps needed to achieve optimum line efficiency and product quality.  Monitor CIQ, TARS, ICT Diagnostic defect analysis sheet, feeder data (and other available sources of information) continuously for tracking and gauging machine and process performance.  Maintain and repair all SMT equipment on assigned line(s).  Determine when necessary machine repairs are needed and perform out-of-cycle maintenance.  Perform ‘as-required’ preventative maintenance of SMT equipment on assigned line(s).  Perform initial diagnosis of non-SMT equipment on assigned line(s), and execute repairs within skill level. Escalate more complex issues to Industrial Techs, and provide assistance as needed to accomplish repairs.  Assist Machine Operators on assigned line(s) by providing ongoing training and direction.  Assist with machine operation in order to expedite changeover, cover breaks, or otherwise improve line efficiency.  Interface with Line Supervisors, Manufacturing Engineers and Machine Support Manager to determine corrective actions needed, and be the front line person in ensuring that assigned line(s) performs with the maximum efficiency and product quality.  Provide training to Manufacturing Engineering Tech I employees.  Assist Manufacturing Engineers in achieving optimum process performance by measuring and / or optimizing of reflow profiles, wave solder profiles, and screen printing of solder paste.  Provide recommendations for designing, fabricating and / or modifying necessary tooling, and product design for manufacturability (DFM) improvements.  Provide daily ‘pass-down’ reports to Project Engineer, Manufacturing Engineer and the Manufacturing Engineering Technician on the following shift.  Adhere to all safety and health rules and regulations associated with this position and as directed by supervisor.  Comply with all procedures within the company security policy. 

Education And Minimum Requirements

Associate’s degree highly preferred

Minimum one to two years related knowledge or experience with SMT process, wave soldering, selective soldering and/or training

Minimum one to two years of experience with PMs and troubleshooting of SMT and soldering manufacturing equipment on circuit assembly lines

Or equivalent combination of education and experience.

, BE AWARE OF FRAUD: When applying for a job at Jabil you will be contacted via correspondence through our official job portal with a jabil.com e-mail address; direct phone call from a member of the Jabil team; or direct e-mail with a jabil.com e-mail address. Jabil does not request payments for interviews or at any other point during the hiring process. Jabil will not ask for your personal identifying information such as a social security number, birth certificate, financial institution, driver’s license number or passport information over the phone or via e-mail. If you believe you are a victim of identity theft, contact the Federal Bureau of Investigations internet crime hotline (www.ic3.gov), the Federal Trade Commission identity theft hotline (www.identitytheft.gov) and/or your local police department. Any scam job listings should be reported to whatever website it was posted in.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Manufacturing Engineering Technician I - Third Shift - Bryan Dairy
output_json.summary: Third Shift role requiring manufacturing knowledge or experience with SMT processes, machine maintenance, and process support.
job_responsibilities: Maintain and develop machine programs, PD files, and machine setups
Track and gauge machine and process performance
Ensure line efficiency and product quality
Provide training to Manufacturing Engineering Tech I employees
Adhere to safety and health rules
